intro: Erepsia simulans, commonly known as the false sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial herb that typically thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. Erepsia simulans is often found in rocky soils and is adapted to survive in regions with limited rainfall.
